name: Corporate Deposit
description: Provides account, settlement, and cash management deposit services for corporate customers.

overview.summary: Offers one-stop, full lifecycle management for corporate accounts, diverse payment and settlement services, and a rich matrix of deposit products to help companies efficiently manage cash and increase funds.

modules.name: Account, Settlement, and Cash Management
modules.description: Provides core functions for corporate account management, payment settlement, and various corporate deposit products.

functions.title: Account Opening
functions.description: Provides functions to open corporate general settlement accounts or sub-accounts.

functions.title: Offline Verification
functions.description: Bank performs offline review of company-submitted account opening materials to confirm customer identity authenticity and legitimacy.

functions.title: Account Filing
functions.description: Submits relevant materials to financial regulatory agencies to complete filing procedures.

functions.title: Account Inquiry
functions.description: Provides queries for account balances, transaction details, receipts, and statements.

functions.title: Account Change
functions.description: Provides functions to modify corporate account information.

functions.title: Account Closure
functions.description: Provides functions to close corporate accounts.

functions.title: Annual Account Review
functions.description: Annually reviews compliance, legality, account info, and document authenticity for opened RMB corporate settlement accounts, compares with system records, and marks annual review status.

functions.title: Dormant Account Check
functions.description: Checks corporate settlement accounts to identify accounts with no transactions for over a year and flags them.

functions.title: Monthly Business Abnormality Check
functions.description: Conducts monthly reviews of company operational irregularities, e.g., late annual reports, unreachable registered address, unfulfilled administrative licenses, tax violations — directly impacting company credit, operations, and financing.

functions.title: Bank-Enterprise Reconciliation
functions.description: Bank-initiated; based on point-in-time balances, adjusts unreconciled items to confirm if current-period transactions match between bank and enterprise.

functions.title: Single Transfer
functions.description: Transfers funds from the bank’s general settlement account to another recipient account.

functions.title: Batch Transfer
functions.description: Transfers funds from the bank’s general settlement account to multiple recipient accounts in one batch.

functions.title: Scheduled Transfer
functions.description: Pre-schedules transfers from the bank’s general settlement account to other recipient accounts at set times.

functions.title: Corporate Payroll
functions.description: Provides salary, allowance, and bonus payment functions.

functions.title: Corporate Payout
functions.description: Provides other corporate mass payment functions, e.g., expense reimbursements (non-salary corporate-to-personal transfers).

functions.title: Corporate Collection
functions.description: Provides corporate-to-corporate and corporate-to-personal collection capabilities.

functions.title: Deposit Product Launch/Removal
functions.description: Creates, maintains, and launches deposit products.

functions.title: Deposit Product Display
functions.description: Displays key info of deposit products to users, including product name, yield, purchase and launch rules, etc.

functions.title: Asset and Yield Inquiry
functions.description: Shows customers the status and earnings of various types of assets.

functions.title: Agreement Deposit Sign/Cancel
functions.description: Provides signing and canceling functions for agreement deposit products; agreement deposits pay ordinary demand interest up to a set amount, with excess balances earning higher agreement deposit rates.

functions.title: Notice Deposit Deposit/Withdrawal
functions.description: Provides deposit and withdrawal functions for notice deposit products; customer notifies bank in advance to withdraw — one-day or seven-day notice periods apply.

functions.title: Time Deposit Deposit/Withdrawal
functions.description: Provides deposit and withdrawal functions for time deposit products; deposits made for a set term and rate, with principal and interest withdrawn at maturity.

functions.title: Large-denomination Certificate of Deposit Deposit/Withdrawal
functions.description: Provides deposit and withdrawal functions for large CDs; fixed-term deposit certificates with large amounts, fixed rates, and transferability.

functions.title: Customer Creation
functions.description: Creates corporate customer records in the system and assigns customer numbers.

functions.title: Customer Information Maintenance
functions.description: Provides functions to modify corporate customer information.

functions.title: Batch Information Maintenance
functions.description: Provides functions to batch modify corporate customer information.

functions.title: Customer Information Inquiry
functions.description: Provides queries for corporate customer information.

functions.title: Customer Information Record Deletion
functions.description: Provides functions to delete specific corporate customer records (e.g., contact info, ID info), while keeping customer status active in the system.

functions.title: Cancel Customer
functions.description: Provides functions to cancel corporate customers, changing their system status to “Canceled.”

functions.title: Partner Onboarding
functions.description: Registers partner information and assigns access permissions on the open banking platform.

functions.title: API Management
functions.description: Manages internal bank service interfaces exposed to partners.
